attributes.action: Allow March 1st, St Davids Day, to be a Bank Holiday. St Davids Day should be allowed to become a Bank Holiday in Wales in order for the Welsh to celebrate their Saint.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St Davids Day should become a Bank Holiday even if it is only in Wales. It would give the Welsh a chance to celebrate their Saint and keep up the patriotism within our magnificent country.
